page.title: 05SHELTERED HOUSING IN HARLOW
page.content: The newest building by our school is {Latton Hall Close,}built in 1985.It is purpose-built by the Council to house thirty elderly people.I am Caroline Vaughan,and I live there because my mum is the Warden and looks after the old people. They all have their own little flats or bungalows,plus a big common room which has a snooker table and organ. Twice a week they have coffee mornings and sales.On Wednesdays there is Bingo and a raffle. Built into the Complex is an exciting conservatory which is going to have lovely plants and trees.There is also a communal washing machine and tumble drier. The old people really like their new homes.They can be independent and safe as my mum keeps an eye on them.
